meanings.definition: A person who avoids or shuns something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The shunners stayed away from the haunted house.
meanings.sent2: The shunners always skipped the scary movies.
meanings.sent3: The shunners missed out on the fun of the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The shunners were like ghosts, disappearing when things got tough.
meanings.sent5: The shunners were like shadows, never seen in the light of new experiences.

meanings.definition: Those who habitually avoid or ignore something.
meanings.sent1: The group of shunners never joined in group activities.
meanings.sent2: The shunners consistently dodged any form of confrontation.
meanings.sent3: The shunners were like elusive butterflies, fluttering away from any attention.
meanings.sent4: The shunners were like magnets with reversed poles, repelling instead of attracting.
meanings.sent5: The shunners were like silent whispers, barely noticed in the noise of everyday life.
